examples: management hired and fired labor in line with demand
synonyms: contract "they hire labor in line with demand"

definitions.definition: employ for a short time to do a particular job.
examples: don't hire a babysitter who's under 16

definitions.definition: make oneself available for temporary employment.
examples: he hired himself out as a laborer

definitions.definition: obtain the temporary use of (something) for an agreed payment; rent.
examples: she had to hire a dress for the wedding

definitions.definition: grant the temporary use of something for an agreed payment.
